website_summaries.verdict: A non-synthetic beard balm that melts between your fingers to provide shape and a lightly masculine scent containing cedar and eucalyptus.
pros: Provides a light shine without being greasy in a beeswax, coconut, and grape-seed oil formula
cons: A little expensive for the size
Scent is too strong for some
The hold is weaker than some other balms

customer_reviews.title: Mild forest aromas to tame your face shrubbery
customer_reviews.text: I smell like I got spooked by bigfoot and fell down the side of the rocky mountains hitting every fine smelling pine and shrub on the way down, without of course getting injured. Its not an abrasive aroma at all either which is great. Enjoying it so far.

customer_reviews.title: Cedar Wax.
customer_reviews.text: This beard wax has a simple fragrance profile, it's just cedar. I have heard it described as "Woodsy" "Manly" and like "a cabin in the woods." What a bunch hipster hogwash, obviously they never carried a chainsaw for a living. To be honest this wax does not preform to my expectations. It neither spreads and lubricates like a oil, nor has any hold like a wax. It does keep the moths at bay, and is a decent boot wax.
customer_reviews.author: davidbrown

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, great look
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, talk about a manly smell. Heavy ceder with a touch of vanilla and tea tree oil. Smells like a box of fine cigars to me. Wife LOVES it. Applies well. The balm is a bit firmer then others (more wax maybe?), but once I get a bit in my hand it melts easy and blends in the beard well. Did I mention it smells AMAZING? Leaves a light sheen in the beard too, no greasy mess. Looking forward to trying more of their stuff in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes the smell better than honest Amish
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I was looking for something to replace my honest Amish beard balm due to the smell, and that's when I stumbled across Rocky Mountain Barber company. The stuff apparently has more beeswax in it which makes it hold better, but it don't feel like it is as moisturizing as honest Amish. Still, I'll use this more than my honest Amish because it smells like a pine forest for the first few hours after you put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P.

customer_reviews.title: Is it a Beard Balm - NO
customer_reviews.text: Not like any beard balm I've used. Pay attention to the product description, it states 8 essential oils. That's exactly what you get. Goes on oily, stays oily, touch your beard - oily fingers, wife strokes your beard she has oily hands, phone touches beard you have oily touch screen. I really wanted to like it. The hold power was totally void, it certainly moisturizes being an oil and the smell is just okay, not quite the cedar scent we all know. I trusted the reviews, must be a whole lot of oily bearded men out there.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Beat the itch and enjoy growing a beard!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for softening and hydrating my beard and skin. I used to hate growing a beard because of the weeks of itchiness I would experience. Using this daily has completely eliminated that and helped me achieve a decent beard that looks and smells great. I got the Cedarwood scent which took a little getting used to for me. If I bought it again, I'd consider another scent or go with unscented.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M

customer_reviews.title: Beard for 2+ years and tested 7+ beard balm/oil products.
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very strong smell to the point where it’s similar to the smell of a cleaning product. Also doesn’t fit in the balm section for me. It’s more of a bar of soap feeling instead or a paste.
customer_reviews.author: pTp Gaming

customer_reviews.title: Newbie to beard balm with review
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Outstanding customer service. Had some concerns upon receipt about consistency as well as scent. Admittedly, this is my first beard balm. But there was a card included to contact if dissatisfied, so I wrote to them. Detailed response within 12 hours. Sent a video showing that consistency is correct. Offered replacement that was unscented. After a few days, I came to realize that while it is strong upon application, it dissipates quickly and ultimately I've come to really like the scent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Double H

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: use it daily and I do enjoy the scent.. others have complained it smelled "chemical like".. nah, it smells good.. in fact the true aroma comes from the ingredients, no altered/chemical smells added.. so you get what you're expecting.. works well, smells good, and I'll purchase more when I'm out....
customer_reviews.author: tadolph

customer_reviews.title: Awesome balm! I've tried many different brands over the ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome balm! I've tried many different brands over the past couple years and this one far outperforms the others. The scent isn't overpowering(per the GF), but has a nice masculine smell that gives a subtle "just got back from camping" feel. I have a short-medium length beard that needs to be professional for work reasons, and this balm is perfect for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pine not Cedar.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure the folks over at Rocky Mountain Barber know what Cedar smells like. While this does have a very faint cedar scent it is dominated by a strong pine tar/pine sap scent. The balm itself seems to do a decent job and the scent isn't bad it's just not the cedar smell I thought I was buying.
customer_reviews.author: DodgeBall

customer_reviews.title: Smells Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Before using this beard balm I was using The Honest Amish. I just got this version and I already like it better. It's a lot less visually greasy when you apply it to your face and the smell is so great. I just hope it doesn't turn into granules after a few months like the honest Amish did. If you are using Minoxidil on your face I recommend you definitely use beard balm.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R

customer_reviews.title: Strong Scent; Stronger Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The Cedarwood scent was overwhelmingly strong for my taste so I reached out to customer support (HELLO@ROCKYMOUNTAINBARBER.COM) to inquire about exchanging for a can of sandalwood instead; they responded within an hour and offered to send me a new can of sandalwood beard-balm free of charge, no questions asked! Excellent customer support, and outstanding products (I highly recommend the RMBC Sandalwood hair and beard comb as well as the pocket sized beard comb). Keep up the quality work!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cycles

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: First, it's easy to get out of the can. Seems waxy, but melts very nicely in your hands once you work it. Applies very easily to your beard. As others have mentioned, it's more of a pine scent than cedar. I think it's a little overpowering, but not too bad. I might go for the unscented next time. So far, this is the best balm I've tried. It's very similar to smooth viking.
customer_reviews.author: aperfectopportunity

customer_reviews.title: Best beard balm I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: It's hard buying beard balm online, cause you can't smell the stuff. I've tried many many brands, and this is by far and away the best. It has a deliciously rich and complex aroma, without being overpowering. The cedar smell evokes cigar smoke, overstuffed leather chairs in wood paneled rooms with roaring fires, and yet somehow still the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Beard Balm For Your Man
customer_reviews.text: This beard balm is a great product at keeping my husbands beard soft and conditioned,and smelling great. This product has a great sent to it and I love the smell,my husband likes it too. I do recommend this product to any man who wants extra conditioning for his beard and to smell great for your loved ones. Thanks for the great product which I will be purchasing again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl W.

customer_reviews.title: Facial Gold
customer_reviews.text: I've tried cabinets full of products that just don't cut it. One week in, my beard is softer, manageable, and this product does not cause facial break outs. Not 100% sold on the scent, as it smells like you walked out of a Colorado forest. BUT it dissipates in five minutes or less. Good product and the consistency is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Never again with this scent from this company
customer_reviews.text: Got sample from this company before of this product and was great but what I got when purchased full container wasn't the same and smelled terrible and washed out right away cuz made me want to throw up from the scent. Hope don't have same issue with Sandalwood
customer_reviews.author: Bandit4life

customer_reviews.title: Good balm, great smell
customer_reviews.text: This balm smells great and has light hold. It is very soft and thus I tend to accidentally use more than I should. So I've gone through it quickly. This is a good balm but as my beard has gotten longer I've switched to oils and wax mostly. If I ever decide to go back to balms I'd likely try this one again.
customer_reviews.author: jpl

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers loved the scent, I don't know if I got the bottom of the barrel or what but mine smelled like cedar mixed with motor oil. I wanted to get the redwood but couldn't find in the single tin, ah well try another kind.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnyoneso

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this balm smell great - though I'm sure there will be some freak out there who doesn't like the cedar scent - but it leaves your beard soft. Don't misunderstand, it doesn't turn your steel wool beard into high-pile brushed fleece, it just makes it softer. Depending on the amount used some may find it slightly 'greasy'. This is a plus point with me as it is now summer and skin tends to get drier in the winter. So, I really look forward to it in a couple of months. Will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty1

customer_reviews.title: Cold pressed Paul Bunyan for your face
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. First off the tin is densely packed not your typical air infused balm; you are for sure getting your money there. The balm is light and has a great scent. The balm is thinner than most in regards to feel but has enough hold to catch those strays and keep them in line. Not sure if this has less bees wax or if the processing is done differently either way I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: ... but dissipates quickly to a level that is very nice. After using this for a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: The smell is strong at first but dissipates quickly to a level that is very nice. After using this for a couple weeks, I am finding flakes in my beard. It doesn't feel like dandruff (which I used to get) and I think it is the balm drying in flaking. I will not buy this again as it is causing a very similar problem to what I was trying to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Warren R.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far! Little oily but does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend said the only way she'd let me grow a beard was to use something to make it softer. First time I used it she was shocked at how soft it was! Does make your beard oily so if you touch it your hands will get a little oily but I guess that's what makes it softer. Scent is powerful immediately after application but tones down throughout the day and is only strong smelling to you since it's right under your nose. And it smells pretty good but a little like poperei. Overall, good experience with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells fantastic! I put it on before I go to ...
customer_reviews.text: All the way out in Guam! Got here on time. Smells fantastic! I put it on before I go to work in the morning. Last all day and tames that mane! When you put it on at first it smells sweet. Then the piney cedar smell comes out. I’ve tried a lot of others but this on smells the best. You have to get a horse bristled brush and you’ll love your beard.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great scent!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the world of beard balm. Being my first purchase, I wasn't terribly sure what to expect. I was pleasantly surprised by the scent. It's not overpowering, but also doesn't last terribly long. I would guess a few hours. It does help hold some of my more difficult areas in place, however, it doesn't have a ton of hold. It's not greasy, and doesn't leave my beard feeling oily or anything. Overall, I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Scent is too strong
customer_reviews.text: Decent balm but the scent is overpowering. It was all I could smell the entire day I used it. My girlfriend was not a fan of the smell as well. It reminds me of the smell of incense they use at a church. If you like that smell then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good, light balm, but not for shaping or control.
customer_reviews.text: Very light balm. I was expecting something much more firm like "Honest Amish". This stuff is good for moisturizing, but will not offer much control or support for shaping.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Portion Sizes
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the product. However, they are selling a 2.0 ounce portion that is not actually 2.0 ounces. I compared it to other balms I have purchased and they had the smallest 2.0 ounce container. Other than the portion size being inadequate for the price, I enjoyed the product. I want more balm for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Annie West

customer_reviews.title: Too Smokey
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy Mountain’s products. I order their pomade on a regular basis. I thought I would try their beard balm. The balm does what it is supposed to do. Held the beard together well. I don’t care for the smokey aroma though. It smells like burnt wood and cigarettes. I really enjoy their product but I won’t buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for outdoorsy men
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, keeps my beard nice and soft. Has a great, outdoorsy scent that isn't super strong or overpowering. People would not notice the fragrance unless they got up into your personal space, and then expect compliments. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: theFarmingDude

customer_reviews.title: So solid
customer_reviews.text: Great on my beard at any length, the smell is clean without being overpowering. Definitely keeps my beard soft and keeps your skin from getting dry underneath
customer_reviews.author: Heff

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Scent
customer_reviews.text: As a balm it's ok, a little dense, but ok. The scent, however, is awful. I enjoy cedar, but this stuff smells like the inside of an abandoned doublewide.
customer_reviews.author: LittleJoe

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my facial hair life?
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!! Love the smell. It's like a redwood forest after the rain. The consistency is perfect. Not super soft and goopy and not real hard at the same time. This is exactly what I've been searching for in a beard balm and I'm pretty sure the only one I'm getting from now on. Thanks Rocky Mountain Barber Company.
customer_reviews.author: stephen p reyes

customer_reviews.title: It works. Try it.
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to get used to the cedar smell as it is pretty strong. My beard has gotten long enough that if I don't use this it goes crazy curly and I look like escaped from a caveman display. This manages to keep it in control. Don't use too much as it is somehow both slippery and sticky and it will feel like you combed chicken fat into your beard if you overdo it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Blake Stover

customer_reviews.title: Hard as cement to get out, but works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Its harder than a rock and you really have to either dig in to get it or cut into it with something. Once you're in, it works ok, definitely wax based and my wife likes the smell. Just not the easiest thing to use cleanly in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: James V Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good smell, not too strong and conditions and shapes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beard balm. I’ve tried three different brands including this one and this was the only one that didn’t have too strong of a smell and it also has a good texture which helps shape my beard. It makes my beard soft and not itchy. It has a nice mild cedar smell to it that’s not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Brett B.

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, great ingredients, but doesn't smell great.
customer_reviews.text: Part of the reason I purchased this was because it advertised "great scent." It feels really good and has great ingredients, but it doesn't smell great. It smells like when I walk into a health food store. Not bad, just not the kind of thing you want your beard to smell like.
customer_reviews.author: Tex Burrito

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but Powerful Scnet
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have a strong hold, and it has a POWERFUL scent. Imagine getting sprayed in the face with ceder-scented wood polish. That only lasts a little while, though.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Jones

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Pinecones...
customer_reviews.text: The product works great... my only problem is that most certainly does not smell like cedar. When I put it on it make me think of the Christmas pine cones they put in front of the store cause they smell so strong. I am disappointed cause I cannot wear the product without feeling overwhelmed by the smell. I wore it a few times trying to get into it but I can’t. Again great product, just got the title wrong in calling it cedar wood.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin vanloo

customer_reviews.title: Oh that Smell...
customer_reviews.text: Its obviously a quality product. It melts rapidly in my fingers and is not grainy. It makes my beard soft and shine nicely. It even provides a little hold which I like. however my issue is with the scent. It dose smell like cedar but not "fresh" Cedar. More like the bottom cedar drawer of a dresser thats been kept in a wet basement for 20 years. I was surprised accurate that similarity was. Ill keep it throw it in a shave kit but I don't think Ill use it much.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product - not a great value
customer_reviews.text: It is nice. smells good and melts easily and is easy to work in. It costs more than other options and I was ok with that. disappointed that the container is kinda stingy too. i'll try some others after this one is done.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Burns

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly unruly beard especially when it gets longer. This stuff does a good job of keeping it under control.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Delivery and product quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. What I don’t love is that the courier dropped it off at my door while I was gone for ten hours after the fact. It’s at a downtown metro condo location where things could very easily go missing if unattended. The courier would have been able to easily figure that out but chose the easy route and left it. It was remarkable that it was still there when I got home.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff! Really glad I purchased this! You’ll probably find yourself chopping down trees wielding a hatchet and wearing a flannel once you put this stuff on!!! Your friends will more than likely nickname you “Buck” or “Hoss” as well, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: Works great, hard to apply
customer_reviews.text: Just picked up the beard balm for the first time, love the scent and how it works but it is very hard to apply. The balm is very firm and even when warming it up with a hairblower it is a challenge to get the product out of the can and into my beard. Aside from the application challenge I do enjoy this product though, smells great and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: No more beard burn!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend for his birthday and we both love it! He has very coarse facial hair and this balm makes it MUCH softer and more manageable. He applies it after his shower every day and the scent lingers just enough to be pleasant but not nearly enough to be overpowering. I'll definitely be a repeat customer - no more beard burn for me!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I would like for this product to smell stronger of cedar
customer_reviews.text: I would like for this product to smell stronger of cedar. I am a carpenter and often have the pleasure of working with cedar Other than that this beard balm does smell pleasant (a bit more citrus than cedar). It melts nicely in your hands and tames the rats nest nicely One star with held due to the lacking cedar aroma.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job, but it is very hard and dense ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job, but it is very hard and dense and thus not easy to get onto your fingers or palms to rub in. Smell is cedar and does fade fairly quickly to just a lingering scent. A more malleable formula and it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Woodsy
customer_reviews.text: This is more on the light oil side and I was hoping it had a bit of a waxy texture. It does have a pleasant woodsy smell that isn't overpowering. I don't have much of a beard, but this would be good for those who just want some conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: If you like a light but calm aroma this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the aroma from this one, It really makes my morning. This is not a hard balm to retrieve from the can like others can be. I would definitely purchase this or other products from them again.
customer_reviews.author: vvnrox87

customer_reviews.title: He loves this brand the most so far and they have been great and personable since I purchased the product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend as an additional product for his beard. He uses special shampoo, conditioner, and oil but was looking for something to smooth it down. He loves the scent and loves the feeling of it. It definitely made a difference in the look of his large beard, tamed it down a bit. I also purchased one of their wooden combs. He loves this brand the most so far and they have been great and personable since I purchased the product. Looking forward to getting him many more of their products
customer_reviews.author: Bree Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've tried numerous beard oils and balms and have finally found the one for me. The cedarwood scent is fantastic, no fake chemical smell. The balm itself works great. Softens my beard without leaving it oily or greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gross

customer_reviews.title: I smell like a tree
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. You end up smelling like a tree. If you like that then it's the product for you. Wife gets horny with the smell. And dog started peeing on me because I smell like a cedar tree. I'm looking for work boots and checked shirt to complete the look. Trying to find a manual on how to chop down trees on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Zucutumm

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely lots to love about this beard balm. I'm a rookie to the balm wax and oil scene and I've struggled with coarse straggly beard my whole adult life. Not only did it get the straggly under control, my beard is also becoming more soft as it soaks up all the good oils. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Addison

customer_reviews.title: She loves this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Smells like fresh pine, keeps my beard and mustache tame, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is the first beard balm I've tried so I can't really compare it to anything. I like it, it has a nice woody smell to it and it makes my Goatee shine. The 1.00 off coupon sealed the deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Salsa Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioning
customer_reviews.text: Recently have been trying different Balms and the winner is Rocky Mountain Barber! I have a very long beard and it keeps it conditioned all day long! Smells good and I highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Craig Moos

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using balms/oils for a few years and this is definitely one of the best I've tried. Not too oily, not too waxy, scent is super nice, though a little too strong. I'll probably by a couple more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Oblivious

customer_reviews.title: Solid option.
customer_reviews.text: I do appreciate the amount of healthy and natural elements all integrated into this product. It lasts a really long time even for my beard that's 6+ inches long. The toughest thing in buying these products is the personal preference and smell. I will say it's not my most favorite smell, but it definitely helps my facial skin. I'm new to having a bard and what products work best for me. Balms don't help shape the beard as much as I thought compared to beard butter.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to my dad. He says, “my beard has never felt better”
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, great smell just watch how much you use!
customer_reviews.text: Product holds well and adds a nice sheen to my beard. However, be warned as I wasn’t ready for how little one needs to use of it. I put on the normal amount as I have with prior ones for years but non had such a strong last smell as this. It reminded me of the pine trees here in Colorado after a fresh morning rain, delightful but strong so don’t go heavy on this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Best balm I’ve tried so far
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several different beard balms to help me manage the wave in my beard as it gets longer and this is the best one I’ve tried to date. Great smell but not too strong, and gives good control while still leaving my beard relatively soft.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Giulvezan

customer_reviews.title: Off Batch
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened with the tin I got, but I basically got a tin of pure oil. It's not overly warm where I live and it never hardened up, so I know it didn't just melt on me. Gave 2 stars because it still smelled nice.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cedarwood smell
customer_reviews.text: Love this beard balm. The smell is very strong at first when you put it on but it fades quickly and is just right after that. The amount is too small but also not too big so that you can travel with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor Schulz

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. Softens up the hair well. Smells good but not strong. Good price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Works great great mountain smell very happy with this product thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Tree breeze
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a huge fan of the Cedar scent, wrote the company to let them know, had a new fresh scent inbound within 24 hours. Great company, the sandalwood balm and the pomade are on point.
customer_reviews.author: Smoseph

customer_reviews.title: ... stocking - was a gamble because he does not like anything greasy or oily for his face
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his Christmas stocking - was a gamble because he does not like anything greasy or oily for his face. This stuff is great though, non greasy and he loves it! I love it because it gives his beard a nice sheen and it smells pleasant. I'm sick of the other men smells of like "clean cotton" , so this cedar smelling balm was just what I wanted. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: StarryeyedFTM

customer_reviews.title: i think the cedar smell is great but its just a bit to strong and the ...
customer_reviews.text: i think the cedar smell is great but its just a bit to strong and the balm texture is more like a hard wax then soft so applying can be tough but maybe im just doing it wrong first attempt at a beard balm
customer_reviews.author: G23

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: Kinda greasy. Not as thick as some of the other brands, but some people like that. I would classify this as closer to a pomade/oil than a wax. Smells pretty good, though.
customer_reviews.author: Drumnjake

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, perfect amount of hold
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing, holds hair where you want it, makes beard nice and soft. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: XbeasleyX

customer_reviews.title: My husband bought this product after watching a video tutorial ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this product after watching a video tutorial on how to use it! He was looking for something to make his beard less bristley, and it is doing the job!!! Believe me, if you have aspirations of kissing anyone, you will buy this and use it!!! Thank you for making a quality product!!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Nice balm
customer_reviews.text: This balm feels good. Ive only tried one other one(not this brand) that was all natural also but the other one stunk. Couldn't handle the smell. Rocky smells good. Nice wood smell. Shipped fast
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Bought for the men in my life, surrounded by nice beards.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my dad. Boyfriend loved it so much I bought him one too and it smells sexy so I was okay with it. Only now my dad smells like my boyfriend and that's kinda weird..
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, love the essential oil combinations. I'd love to see one with a sort of tobacco/patchouli/vanilla combo. Still struggling a bit with unruly beard hairs popping out after combing but this could be due to not using a fancy wooden comb.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kerins

customer_reviews.title: Smells like pinesol, extremely strong scent even if you only ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells like pinesol, extremely strong scent even if you only use a little. It does keep my beard soft however.
customer_reviews.author: David Morgan-Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: A great suprise.
customer_reviews.text: I recently grew a beard for the first time in 45 years. It was getting a little fly-away when I saw this product on Amazon and decided to try it. I received my order yesterday and tried it today. WOW, it tamed the unruly hairs and left my beard and moustache soft and smooth. I will use nothing else on my facial hair. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Al C

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my brother who has a rather wild ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother who has a rather wild beard. Since giving him this over the weekend, he has been using this and the beard brush everyday. I must say it truly is making a difference!! Will definitely continue buying from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Niko's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: As someone else smelling it I don't think its that great either but not the worst
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves how this makes his beard feel in general but hates the smell! As someone else smelling it I don't think its that great either but not the worst! Definitely takes care of his heard though!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Husband said strongest hold of any beard balm he's tried. Smells great, feels great, easy to apply and get off hands, blends well in beard.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell like cedar.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not smell like cedar. It smells more like pine, and it isn't particularly pleasant due to the strength of the smell. The oil works well enough, soft hair, and and a nice sheen. Cedarwood should smell like cedarwood, and this isn't it. Two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R.

customer_reviews.title: Great products. Wonderful company.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this balm. Even better, their customer service. After every purchase I’ve made from Rocky Mountain, I’ve gotten an email just making sure I’m satisfied. I would also very highly recommend their beard oil and combs. Very high quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best balm I have used yet
customer_reviews.text: The best balm I have used yet. I have tried a few other products which are great for conditioning your beard, but this is the best I have used for control as well. It is great for conditioning and helps keep the flyaways under control. Plus is smells good. I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Quilian

customer_reviews.title: It smells good and works
customer_reviews.text: It works, it smells pretty good, and it tames my crazy beard. I like it. I'll buy it again when I finish this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Best Balm I’ve Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Balm I’ve ever used. Smells great and conditions and softens well. Doesn’t take much and conditions all day. What sold me was the screw on portable tin. . With this tin I can put in my pocket and not have to worry about it leaking as lid screws on very snug. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cress

customer_reviews.title: Best damn product on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the best damn beard balm on the market. I wet my beard in the morning when I get out of bed then straighten it with a hair dryer. I apply the beard balm evenly throughout then apply heat again to comb it straight working the oils in to condition. Beard stays full and in place all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy chemical scent, does not provide a good look to beard hair and caused me itching due to the heavy chemicals that are obviously used in this product. This is my own opinion and there are apparently many others who like this due to its otherwise high rating. Not for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not how I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself kept my skin flake free to a degree, there was still some dry skin, and it really shined. The scent is very heavy on the pine which I am really not a fan of. Smells like Vick's Vapor Rub almost. Maybe if my beard was longer it would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Vin1632

customer_reviews.title: Great for mask wearers
customer_reviews.text: Like a waxy cream. I enjoy using it because when wearing a mask, the smell is goooooood!
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, love that it keeps my beard moisturized so I can avoid flakes on my black shirts. The only thing I wish is that is had a little more hold. But I'll finish out the tin and then see what else Rocky Mountain Barber has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Scent. Ive used a couple different products. And this one is just as good as those. Cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: ... this clearly stands out as the one that smells best! It is also the easiest to apply
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few beard balms and this clearly stands out as the one that smells best! It is also the easiest to apply, as it is thinner than most. It does not feel greasy. I highly recommend this product and will very likely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: TCDenver

customer_reviews.title: A good, woodsy smelling product that works quickly into beard
customer_reviews.text: A good, woodsy smelling product that works quickly into beard. Price is a little steep, but then again, it is on par with most other sellers. The scent is probably the big selling point. If you like cedar wood, you'll like this! Has slightly more control than just beard oil alone. Was hoping for a little more control of a few stray hairs, hence the 4 out of 5 stars. Maybe I just need to go with a wax or something with grit instead? Anyway, my beard looks and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C Grandy

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this balm, it’s scent and how it keeps my beard soft and moisturized. I’ve been using it for a year now and won’t change any time soon. Guys keep it up!
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really really enjoy the smell and so does my wife. It's only been a day but my beard does feel a bit softer and is nice and shinny.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase - Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: If you want to smell like a man who drinks bourbon on the weekends in Tennessee while reclined in your leather rocking chair by the fireplace, then this is the perfect scent for you. It does the job of taming your face mane and smells great, unlike many beard products I've tried before.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Bates

customer_reviews.title: I specifically enjoy the scent of cedar but also like the texture ...
customer_reviews.text: I specifically enjoy the scent of cedar but also like the texture of the balm. I comes out if the tin easily and quickly absorbs into my beard. Additionally it is very easy to wash off your hand, unlike many other companies balm.
customer_reviews.author: Kshira

customer_reviews.title: Love da Smell of Cedarwood
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much will buy again love the smell and the look of my beard
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it and plans to get more when he runs out
customer_reviews.author: LH
